## First Header

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)

farthest_airports <- flights %>%
arrange(desc(distance)) %>%
slice_head(n=1) %>%
left_join(airports, by = c("dest" = "faa")) %>%
select(name) %>%
as.character()
